title: ITR Filing Before Sept. 15 Deadline: Step-By-Step Guide To Using AI Tax Advisors
description: These days, filing taxes has been made easier with the availability of a wide range of services. These include conventional chartered accountants or the online platforms offering tax filing services. A third option is also gaining popularity when it comes to handling finances: the use of artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
content:

title: Larry Ellison beats Elon Musk in billionaire's game. Is Oracle ready to dethrone Tesla from the world's top 10 list?
description: Larry Ellison, the Oracle founder, briefly surpassed Elon Musk to become the world's richest person. This happened after Oracle shares surged, increasing the company's market value significantly. Oracle's rise is due to promising forecasts for its cloud infrastructure revenue. The company has also secured major deals in the artificial intelligence sector. This shift highlights the dynamic nature of wealth rankings.
content: Larry Ellison briefly overtook Elon Musk as the world’s richest man on Wednesday after a historic rally in Oracle Corp shares added $244 billion to the software giant’s market value. The surge pushed Oracle closer to the $1 trillion mark and fueled s... [5056 chars]

title: Empowering Educators: Unveiling AI's Role in Modern Classrooms
description: Artificial intelligence in education is evolving rapidly, outpacing current schools' and universities' preparedness. Informal learning networks spread AI knowledge among students and teachers, but lack depth and focus on ethical issues. Structured professional development for educators is crucial to fostering critical engagement and effective AI integration.

title: AI tools can help, but they can also cause trouble. What advisors need to know.
description: Brokerages and RIA firms are quickly integrating artificial intelligence in their practices, often pushed by next-gen advisors and clients.
